item.title: preFOSDEM MySQL Days 2023
item.description: Two days before the main FOSDEM event, MySQL enthusiasts all over the world gather together for learning and networking at preFOSDEM MySQL Days in Brussels. This time the event took place at the same building where it was interrupted by COVID - ICAB Incubator. The event was free but required registration due to limited capacity. A couple of weeks before the event, all available tickets were sold out. The room was almost full.

item.title: Percona Live 2022
item.description: Links Percona Live 2022 was an amazing 3-day event of keynotes, educational sessions, hands-on activities, and more. It took place in Austin, TX on May 16th-18th. Attendees could hear the biggest names in the industry, discuss their experience, dive deep into software, and offer actionable advice. They also learned about how open source database technology can power applications, improve websites, secure data, and solve critical database issues. On this page, you can find the list of presentations from Percona Live 2022.
